price: Und sag ja nur nicht von einer Sache: „Ich werde dies morgen tun,
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
